resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit?

b.i: When life gives you citrus, make it a warm brew!

resources.string:
Welcome to Jeju Tangerines, 
Where a tale of love and resilience unfolds on Jeju Island! 
Our team, from the poetic Ae-sun to the devoted Gwan-sik, has navigated challenges to build a loving family. 
Even when life throws sour moments their way, they find ways to create sweet memories. Don't miss Gwang-rye, the legendary haenyeo diver, and Geum-myeong, the daughter who breaks boundaries. Join our Jeju tour to experience the essence of their story!
End of list, but the Jeju story continues!
